ValidationRule.description: If the status is 'Fall Through,' then the reason for the fall through needs to be updated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Fall Through'), RecordType.DeveloperName = CASESAFEID('UK'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_for_Fall_Through__c, '') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Contract Status is Fall Through then Reason for Fall Through is mandatory
